content.text: Match ends, Burnley 2, Everton 1.
Second Half ends, Burnley 2, Everton 1.
Matthew Lowton (Burnley) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Oumar Niasse (Everton).
Ashley Barnes (Burnley) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Cuco Martina (Everton).
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Jack Cork.

Ashley Williams (Everton) is shown the red card for violent conduct.
Foul by Ashley Williams (Everton).

Goal!  Burnley 2, Everton 1. Chris Wood (Burnley) header from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Johann Berg Gudmundsson with a cross following a corner.
